SAYS: I probably won't have a lot to say because I don't have any opinions about technological things, but anyway.
I joined newcomers in March 2023, and I have been a chairman of the pop-up committee.
The main purpose I use the website is only to look for events, and then sign up for them if I can do them, if I want to do them.
I think it's very good. I don't know how it can be improved, but yeah, it seems to be, it gets the job done.
Each time I want to go back to the calendar of events, it goes back to the beginning of like many months ago.
It also makes me go back to clicking on list view versus the other calendar view.
I only could do things in the evenings or weekends, so to me, it's very important if I know if it's a Saturday or a Monday through Friday at 10am when I can't do it.
I don't have any suggestions for that really.
THINKS: I am not very tech-savvy and may struggle with complex features.
The website meets my basic needs, so I don't feel the urgency to explore it further.
Frustration with navigation could lead to avoidance of using the website more extensively.
I find it hard to remember how I navigated the website in the past.
I hope there will be a clear way to access alumni information in the future.
DOES: Uses the website primarily to find and sign up for events.
Looks for events by date and prefers list view over calendar view.
Has attempted to find contact information but does not frequently navigate beyond event sign-up.
Participated in discussions about website functionality in committee meetings, indicating she is engaged with the community.
FEELS: Feels satisfied with the basic functionality of the website but wishes for smoother navigation.
Experiences frustration when the website does not remember her previous position in the calendar view.
Feels uncertain about the future accessibility of alumni events and how to stay connected after graduation.
Has a sense of belonging within the newcomer community but is concerned about maintaining connections as an alum.
